articles.title: New movie explores global complicity in Argentina's 'dirty war'
articles.description: Argentina’s military dictatorship led to killings and disappearances of at least 30,000 people. The film "Azor" explores the complicity of even neutral countries.
articles.content: The Argentine military dictatorship's reign of terror involved torture and killings, leading to the disappearance of at least 30,000 people. Now 45 years later, the Swiss filmmaker Andreas Fontana takes the tragic Latin American historical events to ... [9275 chars]

articles.title: Messi overtakes Pele as South America's top scorer
articles.description: Football News - Lionel Messi scored a hat-trick to overtake Pele as the top international goalscorer in South American football history on Friday morning (Sept 10, Singapore time) as Argentina cruised to a 3-0 victory over Bolivia in a World Cup qualifier. Messi pounced for his 77th, 78th... Read more at www.tnp.sg
articles.content:
Lionel Messi has overtaken Pele as the top international goalscorer in South American football.

articles.title: Lionel Messi nets hat-trick for Argentina to overtake Pele as highest scorer in South American football history
articles.description: Lionel Messi treble inspires Argentina to 3-0 World Cup qualifying victory over Bolivia and sees six-time Ballon dOr winner eclipse Brazil great Pele as highest South American goalscorer; Messis international goals tally now up to 79, two more than Peles haul of 77
articles.content:
Lionel Messi broke Pele's record for most international goals by a South American footballer with a hat-trick in Argentina's World Cup qualifying win over Bolivia on Thursday night.
